Headline: #92 Foster Temporary Reroute at Foster/Kimball
ShortDescription: 92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#92 Foster buses are temporarily rerouted via Foster, Pulaski, Bryn Mawr and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Foster/Kimball.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Kolmar
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Kostner, Augusta, Cicero, and Division due to, street blockage at Division/Kolmar.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Kostner, Augusta, Cicero, and Division due to, street blockage at Division/Kolmar.

Allow extra travel time.
